title: McLaren Vale: Pedestrian killed, another injured after hit by ute
text:
A woman has died after she and another man were hit by a car while walking along a main road in McLaren Vale.

Police and ambulance crews rushed to Victor Harbor Rd, near Seaview Rd, about 11.10pm on Saturday in response to reports of two pedestrians being struck by a Holden utility.

A 59-year-old Allenby Gardens woman died at the scene and a man, also 59 and from Allenby Gardens, was taken to Flinders Medical Centre with non life-threatening injuries.

The driver of the vehicle – a 78-year-old Willunga man – sustained minor injuries and was taken to hospital.

media_camera A woman aged 59 from Allenby Gardens died at the scene. Picture: AAP/Mike Burton

He is assisting officers with their investigation.

Police ask anyone who may have seen a man and woman walking along Victor Harbor Rd near Seaview Rd around the time of the crash and has not yet spoken to officers to call Crime Stoppers on 1800 333 000 or report it online at crimestopperssa.com.au.

The woman’s death brings the state’s road toll to 87, compared to 57 at the same time last year.

media_camera Map of showing the junction of Victor Harbor Rd and Seaview Rd, near where the tragedy took place. Picture: Google Images

It’s the fourth accident involving pedestrians in Adelaide’s south in the past few days.

On Thursday, an argument resulted in a man being arrested after he allegedly attempted to run over bystanders, hitting a pedestrian, at Hackham West about 9.55pm. The pedestrian was taken to hospital for treatment for leg injuries.

Just over an hour later, a driver was reported after allegedly hitting a pedestrian in the CBD then fleeing the scene at the intersection of George St and Hindley St just before 11.30pm. The pedestrian, a 32-year-old man from Myrtle Bank, sustained non life-threatening injuries and was taken to the Royal Adelaide Hospital.

And on Wednesday, a man was taken to Flinders Medical Centre with serious leg injuries and a head injury after being hit by car on Main South Rd.

description: An Adelaide woman has been killed after she and a man were hit by a car while walking along Victor Harbor Rd at McLaren Vale.
